name: DENT_EST_PROC_INFO
description: The DENT_EST_PROC_INFO table contains information about predetermination procedures for a billing plan.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the treatment plan record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure who is associated with the dental treatment plan. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EAP table.

columns.name: PROC_DESC
columns.description: The name/description of the procedure which is associated with this dental treatment plan.

columns.name: PROC_QTY
columns.description: The quantity of the dental treatment procedure.

columns.name: PROC_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The charge amount for the dental treatment procedure performed.

columns.name: PROC_ENTRY_DATE
columns.description: The date when the procedure entered into the system.

columns.name: PROC_DELETED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether a procedure is deleted for this dental treatment plan. Y indicates that the procedure is deleted. N or a null value indicates that procedure is not deleted.

columns.name: PROC_MODIFIER
columns.description: The procedure modifier used for the dental treatment procedure.

columns.name: PROC_ENTRY_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user record who entered the procedure. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: PROC_ENTRY_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: PROC_ENTRY_TIME
columns.description: The time when the procedure entered into the system.

columns.name: PROC_DEL_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user record who deleted the procedure. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: PROC_DEL_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: PROC_DEL_DATE
columns.description: The date when the procedure was deleted from the system.

columns.name: PROC_DEL_TIME
columns.description: The time when the procedure was deleted from the system.

columns.name: PROC_TOOTH_NUM_C_NAME
columns.description: The number of the tooth on which procedure was performed.

columns.name: PROC_SURFACE
columns.description: The dental surface where the procedure was performed.

columns.name: PROC_ARCH_C_NAME
columns.description: The dental surface category number for this procedure.

columns.name: PROC_QUADRANT_C_NAME
columns.description: The quadrant category number for this dental procedure.

columns.name: PROC_AREA
columns.description: The dental area where the procedure was performed.

columns.name: SUPERNUMRY_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether a dental procedure is supernumerary for this dental treatment plan. Y indicates that the procedure is supernumerary. N or a null value indicates that procedure is not supernumerary.

columns.name: PROC_FINDING_ID
columns.description: Links the dental treatment plan record to any corresponding dental procedure records that were pulled from to create it.
